Articles.Content:
When i have installed the kethane mod i was playing and playing then i had a idea: building a kethane ship

(using cheats ) and i launched the rocket. when i was in orbit i started the radar.

then i found 2 green spots and de-orbit it to the green spot. now it was the beutiful landing but the paruchute was deploying in fire

but then i was happy it wasnt burned. and when the parachute was deploying in AIRBoom! the back side of the craft whas going on;.;

Who knows? Who cares? This is the greatest abstract surrealist piece I've ever experienced! The way he flawlessly integrated Kethane into the structure, why... I need to take a break from the Fan Works section.

Who knows? Who cares? This is the greatest abstract surrealist piece I've ever experienced! The way he flawlessly integrated Kethane into the structure, why... I need to take a break from the Fan Works section.

Indeed (10char)

Oh my... I'm in tears. Thi-this literary masterpiece is quite possibly the greatest words ever read by mankind. I have re-evaluated my stance on life because of this story. I will fight for all that is good in the world. I will not take anything for granted, especially not Kethane. Thank you op. You have opened my eyes and cleansed my brain. I am forever in your debt.
I remember a similar thing happening to when someone posted a drawing that looked like a 4-year old drawing, and everybody got sarcastic, that's why it was locked.

I remember a similar thing happening to when someone posted a drawing that looked like a 4-year old drawing, and everybody got sarcastic, that's why it was locked.

I remember that vividly. Also, am I the only one with the 'W' at the start and 'AIR' in huge font? If so, you are all missing out on the improvement of the literature.

I remember a similar thing happening to when someone posted a drawing that looked like a 4-year old drawing, and everybody got sarcastic, that's why it was locked.

Now, now, you're ruining the atmosphere.
